ing: 1 Granny Smith apple, cored and diced
1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained and flaked
des: "Removing the seeds from the tomatoes and cucumber keeps this simple salad crisp and fresh."
ins: In a medium bowl, toss together the tomatoes, cucumber, apple and tuna. Stir in the basil pesto until everything is evenly coated. Serve immediately, or chill until serving.
